Caz Brunnen Front-end Developer

About Me Work

My Expertise

I'm a junior/mid-weight developer based in Sydney with an interest in creative projects and emerging technologies. I have over a year's agency experience and am excited to find my next opportunity in web development.

Design

Strong knowledge of HTML5, Liquid and various front-end frameworks such as Bootstrap and Less, and a broad experience working with CSS, Sass and LESS

Code

I enjoy using JavaScript, jQuery and, more recently, React to build smart and exciting websites. I'm learning Unity in my spare time as I love AR and VR.

Tools

Adapt at using Git version controll within a large development team, using tools such as Gulp and Grunt to create a smoother workflow.

Complicated website redesign and build, achieved by myself and a small team of developers. One of my focusses was the registration form. This had to be hooked up to the back-end database and also to the client's registration system.
